'''Henrik Pettersson''' is the third artist hired to work on [[Mojang#Caller’s Bane|Caller’s Bane]], and was hired in August 2011.<ref>{{tweet|carlmanneh|100495725879758848|New addition to the Mojang team: Welcome graphical artist @carnalizer!|August 8, 2011}}</ref> He developed [[Crown and Council]], a surprise game released on Steam for free on April 22, 2016.

On June 28, 2018, he announced his departure from Mojang to join Resolution Games.<ref name="henrikleaving">{{tweet|carnalizer|1012354664816406528|Announcement time! After seven amazing years at Mojang, I'm leaving for new adventures. After vacations I'm joining @resolutiongame as art director. It'll be hard to be without the mojangstas, but I'm also very much looking forward to a chance to do some art things again.|June 28, 2018}}</ref>
